invoice-x/invoice2data

extracts key info from PDF invoices to CSV or JSON

Related repos

  • Extracts tables from PDFs into CSV files using OCR engines
  • Invoicing app for freelancers with quote signing and PDF generation
  • AI tool for extracting structured data from PDFs
  • Open source tool for managing quotes and invoices, with PDF export, client tracking, and self-hosting

  • Convert PDFs to machine-readable formatslike markdown or JSON for easy data extraction
  • extracts tables and text from PDFs, supports visual debugging
